article.title: Lockheed Martin Receives Space Vehicle Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation, Lockheed Martin Space Systems Company, Sunnyvale, California, is being awarded a $13,500,000 firm-fixed-price contract for Space Vehicle 5/6 production gimbal mechanism and beam select switch parts.Â Space and Missile Systems Center Military Satellite Communications Systems, El Segundo, California, is the contracting activity.
